0.text: Innate: Periodically, Poppy's next basic attack is empowered to throw her buckler, gaining  350 bonus range and dealing 20 − 180 (based on level) bonus magic damage. After it hits, the buckler then falls to a location near the target over 1 second, landing and remaining there for up to 4 seconds.
0.html: Innate: Periodically, Poppy's next basic attack is empowered to throw her buckler, gaining  350 bonus range and dealing 20 − 180 (based on level) bonus magic damage. After it hits, the buckler then falls to a location near the target over 1 second, landing and remaining there for up to 4 seconds.
markedPassages: 350 bonus range

1.text: Poppy can move over the buckler to retrieve it, gaining a  shield for  13 / 15.5 / 18% (based on level) of her maximum health for 3 seconds. If the buckler kills the target, it bounces back to Poppy instead of falling. Enemy  champions can move over the buckler to destroy it.

0.text: Passive: Poppy increases her  total armor and  total magic resistance by 10%, doubled to 20% while she is below 40% maximum health.
0.html: Passive: Poppy increases her  total armor and  total magic resistance by 10%, doubled to 20% while she is below 40% maximum health.

total magic resistance

1.text: Active: Poppy gains  40% bonus movement speed and creates an aura around herself for 2 seconds, causing all enemies who attempt to  dash into or within it to be dealt magic damage and  knocked up for 0.5 seconds. If a target was successfully interrupted, they become  grounded and  slowed by 25% for 2 seconds.

0.text: Active: Poppy  dashes to the target enemy's location. If they are in range upon arrival, she deals physical damage and  carries them along with her for up to 400 units.
0.html: Active: Poppy dashes to the target enemy's location. If they are in range upon arrival, she deals physical damage and carries them along with her for up to 400 units.
markedPassages: dashes
carries

1.text: If the target hits terrain, she stops to deal the same physical damage again and  stuns them for a duration.
1.html: If the target hits terrain, she stops to deal the same physical damage again and stuns them for a duration.
markedPassages: stuns

0.text: Active: Poppy  charges while being  slowed by 15% for up to 4 seconds to increase Keeper's Verdict's  range and  knock back distance over 0.5 seconds after the first 0.5 seconds of the channel. Keeper's Verdict can be recast within the duration.
0.html: Active: Poppy charges while being slowed by 15% for up to 4 seconds to increase Keeper's Verdict's  range and knock back distance over 0.5 seconds after the first 0.5 seconds of the channel. Keeper's Verdict can be recast within the duration.
markedPassages: charges
slowed
range
knock back

1.text: Recast: Poppy releases the charge to launch her hammer upwards, dealing physical damage to enemies nearby and in an area in front of her and  knocking them up for 1 second.
1.html: Recast: Poppy releases the charge to launch her hammer upwards, dealing physical damage to enemies nearby and in an area in front of her and knocking them up for 1 second.
markedPassages: knocking them up

2.text: If Keeper's Verdict was charged for at least 0.5 seconds, it deals 100% increased damage and enemies hit are  knocked back up-to 3400 units toward the enemy team's fountain. Additionally, if no enemies are hit in front of Poppy, she sends a shockwave that travels in the target direction until it collides with an enemy champion, which causes a hammer to erupt. Targets hit by the shockwave or the eruption receive the charged effects.
2.html: If Keeper's Verdict was charged for at least 0.5 seconds, it deals 100% increased damage and enemies hit are knocked back up-to 3400 units toward the enemy team's fountain. Additionally, if no enemies are hit in front of Poppy, she sends a shockwave that travels in the target direction until it collides with an enemy champion, which causes a hammer to erupt. Targets hit by the shockwave or the eruption receive the charged effects.
markedPassages: knocked back

3.text: If the charge is  interrupted or completes without reactivation, Keeper's Verdict is cancelled and the ability is put on a  15-second cooldown.
3.html: If the charge is interrupted or completes without reactivation, Keeper's Verdict is cancelled and the ability is put on a  15-second cooldown.
markedPassages: interrupted
15-second

4.text: Enemies knocked  airborne are  revealed and are rendered  untargetable while being displaced if Keeper's Verdict was charged for more than 0.5 seconds.
4.html: Enemies knocked airborne are revealed and are rendered untargetable while being displaced if Keeper's Verdict was charged for more than 0.5 seconds.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (3 charges).
passive.originText: Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (3 charges).

consume.originHTML:
Consume

Consumes a charge to regenerate 4.166 health and 3.125 mana every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, for a total of 100 health and 75 mana. During this time, damaging basic attacks and ability damage against enemy champions burn them, dealing 15 bonus magic damage over 3 seconds, increased to 20 while the user cannot regenerate mana. Bonus damage is halved if applied by area of effect or damage over time.
consume.originText: Consumes a charge to regenerate 4.166 health and 3.125 mana every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, for a total of 100 health and 75 mana. During this time, damaging basic attacks and ability damage against enemy champions burn them, dealing 15 bonus magic damage over 3 seconds, increased to 20 while the user cannot regenerate mana. Bonus damage is halved if applied by area of effect or damage over time.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Spellblade: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals 125% base AD (+ ( 6% / 3%) of target's maximum health) as bonus physical damage on-hit, for a minimum of 150% base AD and a maximum of 250% base AD against monsters. If the target is a champion, heal for 68.75% base AD (+ ( 3.3% / 1.65%) of target's maximum health) (1.5 (begins after using the empowered attack) second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 3% armor penetration and 3% magic penetration.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SPELLBLADE: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals 125% base AD (+ ( 6% /  3%) of target's maximum health) as bonus physical damage on-hit, for a minimum of 150% base AD and a maximum of 250% base AD against monsters. If the target is a champion,  heal for 68.75% base AD (+ ( 3.3% /  1.65%) of target's maximum health) (1.5 (begins after using the empowered attack) second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Shipwrecker: While moving, generates 7 stacks of Momentum every 0.25 seconds, granting up to 40 bonus movement speed at 100 stacks after 3.75 seconds of moving. Momentum decays by 15 every 0.25 seconds while immobilized. Basic attacks consume all stacks to deal 0 − 40 (based on Momentum) (+ 0% − 100% (based on Momentum) base AD) bonus physical damage on-hit. At maximum stacks, the target is also slowed by 50% for 1 second.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SHIPWRECKER: While moving, generates 7 stacks of Momentum every 0.25 seconds, granting up to 40 bonus movement speed at 100 stacks after 3.75 seconds of moving. Momentum decays by 15 every 0.25 seconds while  immobilized. Basic attacks consume all stacks to deal 0 − 40 (based on Momentum) (+ 0% − 100% (based on Momentum) base AD) bonus physical damage on-hit. At maximum stacks, the target is also  slowed by 50% for 1 second.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Absorb: Taking magic damage from champions grants a stack of Steadfast for 7 seconds, stacking up to 6 times with the duration refreshing on subsequent magic damage from them and whenever dealing damage to them. Becoming immobilized by an enemy champion grants 2 stacks and also refreshes the duration. Damaging basic attacks and spells per cast instance can only grant 1 stack of Steadfast every 1 second.
Unique – Dissipate: While at 6 stacks of Steadfast, gain 10% bonus movement speed and reduce all incoming magic damage by 25%.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – ABSORB: Taking magic damage from champions grants a stack of Steadfast for 7 seconds, stacking up to 6 times with the duration refreshing on subsequent magic damage from them and whenever dealing damage to them. Becoming  immobilized by an enemy champion grants 2 stacks and also refreshes the duration. Damaging basic attacks and spells per cast instance can only grant 1 stack of Steadfast every 1 second.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Shipwrecker: While moving, generates 7 stacks of Momentum every 0.25 seconds, granting up to 40 bonus movement speed at 100 stacks after 3.75 seconds of moving. Momentum decays by 15 every 0.25 seconds while immobilized. Basic attacks consume all stacks to deal 0 − 40 (based on Momentum) (+ 0% − 100% (based on Momentum) base AD) bonus physical damage on-hit. At maximum stacks, the target is also slowed by 50% for 1 second.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SHIPWRECKER: While moving, generates 7 stacks of Momentum every 0.25 seconds, granting up to 40 bonus movement speed at 100 stacks after 3.75 seconds of moving. Momentum decays by 15 every 0.25 seconds while  immobilized. Basic attacks consume all stacks to deal 0 − 40 (based on Momentum) (+ 0% − 100% (based on Momentum) base AD) bonus physical damage on-hit. At maximum stacks, the target is also  slowed by 50% for 1 second.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Absorb: Taking magic damage from champions grants a stack of Steadfast for 7 seconds, stacking up to 6 times with the duration refreshing on subsequent magic damage from them and whenever dealing damage to them. Becoming immobilized by an enemy champion grants 2 stacks and also refreshes the duration. Damaging basic attacks and spells per cast instance can only grant 1 stack of Steadfast every 1 second.
Unique – Dissipate: While at 6 stacks of Steadfast, gain 10% bonus movement speed and reduce all incoming magic damage by 25%.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – ABSORB: Taking magic damage from champions grants a stack of Steadfast for 7 seconds, stacking up to 6 times with the duration refreshing on subsequent magic damage from them and whenever dealing damage to them. Becoming  immobilized by an enemy champion grants 2 stacks and also refreshes the duration. Damaging basic attacks and spells per cast instance can only grant 1 stack of Steadfast every 1 second.

Active

Unique – Monolith: Gain a shield for 100 (+ 90% bonus health), decaying over 2.5 seconds, and 25% increased size while active (90 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Fortify: Increase your bonus armor and bonus magic resistance by 5% for 6 seconds when a champion deals damage to you, stacks up to 5 times for a maximum of 25%. This stacks once per unique champion.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Rock Solid: Every first incoming instance of post-mitigation basic damage per cast instance is reduced by 5 (+ 3.5 per 1000 maximum health), maximum 40% reduction each.
Unique – Critical Resilience: Reduces incoming critical strike damage from basic attacks by 20%.
